participant_1.name: Frank Thompson
participant_1.personality: Generous and caring, always looking for ways to help others.
participant_1.background: i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and independent, always seeking new challenges.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i hate the color pink.
